name: Arrow (itch) (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
The game

Your adventure in Arrow starts with you at the bottom of a Mountain with an ancient relic in your hands.

You remember nothing, but you somehow know that the arrow you hold wants you to reach the summit of the Mountain.

Reveal the mysteries of this sacred place uncovering the secrets it protects!

How to play

You can play directly in this web page with a limited resolution, or you can download the executables to enjoy a full experience

The controls

  • Move with A and D
  • Space-bar to jump
  • Click mouse right to dash in the WASD direction
  • Aim with your mouse position 
  • Click mouse left to fire the arrow
  • Click mouse left again to activate the arrow power!
  • Or press C to call the arrow back to you

Joypad support will be added in a future release
